title: Exposure biomarker profiles of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons based on a rat model using a versatile analytical framework
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1268-1280
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00109E, Paper
Xiaoqian Jia, Manman Long, Yiming Pang, Hang An, Yu Jin, Jianjun Jiang, Zhiwen Li, Bin Wang
A comprehensive analytical framework was developed to select appropriate exposure biomarkers of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs).
